member.summary: Returns all external urls (not interwikies) from the given page(s)

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Page.revisions
member.summary: Get revision information May be used in several ways: 1) Get data about a set of pages (last revision), by setting titles or pageids parameter 2) Get revisions for one given page, by using titles/pageids with start/end/limit params 3) Get data about a set of revisions by setting their IDs with revids parameter All parameters marked as (enum) may only be used with a single page (#2)

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Page.templates
member.summary: Returns all templates from the given page(s)

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Page.videoinfo
member.summary: Extends imageinfo to include video source information

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Page.categoryinfo
member.summary: Returns information about the given categories

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Page.info
member.summary: Get basic page information such as namespace, title, last touched date, ...
Block a user
member.param: Username, IP address or IP range you want to block
A block token previously obtained through prop=info
Relative expiry time, e.g. '5 months' or '2 weeks'. If set to 'infinite', 'indefinite' or 'never', the block will never expire.
Reason for block
Block anonymous users only (i.e. disable anonymous edits for this IP)
Prevent account creation
Automatically block the last used IP address, and any subsequent IP addresses they try to login from
Prevent user from sending e-mail through the wiki. (Requires the "blockemail" right.)
Hide the username from the block log. (Requires the "hideuser" right.)
Allow the user to edit their own talk page (depends on $wgBlockAllowsUTEdit)
If the user is already blocked, overwrite the existing block
Watch the user/IP's user and talk pages

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.compare(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get the difference between 2 pages You must pass a revision number or a page title or a page ID id for each part (1 and 2)
member.param: First title to compare
First page ID to compare
First revision to compare
Second title to compare
Second page ID to compare
Second revision to compare

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.delete(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,LinqToWiki.Generated.deletewatchlist,System.String)
member.summary: Delete a page
member.param: A delete token previously retrieved through prop=info
Title of the page you want to delete. Cannot be used together with pageid
Page ID of the page you want to delete. Cannot be used together with title
Reason for the deletion. If not set, an automatically generated reason will be used
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch
The name of the old image to delete as provided by iiprop=archivename

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.deleteglobalaccount(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete a global user.
member.param: User to delete.
Your edit token.
Reason for deleting the user.

member.summary: Create and edit pages.
member.param: Edit token. You can get one of these through prop=info. The token should always be sent as the last parameter, or at least, after the text parameter
Title of the page you want to edit. Cannot be used together with pageid
Page ID of the page you want to edit. Cannot be used together with title
Section number. 0 for the top section, 'new' for a new section
The title for a new section
Page content
Edit summary. Also section title when section=new and sectiontitle is not set
Minor edit
Non-minor edit
Mark this edit as bot
Timestamp of the base revision (obtained through prop=revisions&rvprop=timestamp). Used to detect edit conflicts; leave unset to ignore conflicts
Timestamp when you obtained the edit token. Used to detect edit conflicts; leave unset to ignore conflicts
Override any errors about the article having been deleted in the meantime
Don't edit the page if it exists already
Throw an error if the page doesn't exist
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch
The MD5 hash of the text parameter, or the prependtext and appendtext parameters concatenated. If set, the edit won't be done unless the hash is correct
Add this text to the beginning of the page. Overrides text
Add this text to the end of the page. Overrides text. Use section=new to append a new section
Undo this revision. Overrides text, prependtext and appendtext
Undo all revisions from undo to this one. If not set, just undo one revision
Automatically resolve redirects
Content serialization format used for the input text
Content model of the new content

Allows bots to make assertions. true - Always true; nassert=true will fail if the extension is installed. false - Always false; assert=false will fail if the extension is installed. user - Verify that bot is logged in, to prevent anonymous edits. bot - Verify that bot is logged in and has a bot flag. exists - Verify that page exists. Could be useful from other extensions, i.e. adding nassert=exists to the inputbox extension. test - Verify that this wiki allows random testing. Defaults to false, but can be overridden in LocalSettings.php.

Allows bots to make negative assertions. true - Always true; nassert=true will fail if the extension is installed. false - Always false; assert=false will fail if the extension is installed. user - Verify that bot is logged in, to prevent anonymous edits. bot - Verify that bot is logged in and has a bot flag. exists - Verify that page exists. Could be useful from other extensions, i.e. adding nassert=exists to the inputbox extension. test - Verify that this wiki allows random testing. Defaults to false, but can be overridden in LocalSettings.php.
Answer to the CAPTCHA
CAPTCHA ID from previous request

Import summary
Uploaded XML file
For interwiki imports: wiki to import from
For interwiki imports: page to import
For interwiki imports: import the full history, not just the current version
For interwiki imports: import all included templates as well
For interwiki imports: import to this namespace
Import as subpage of this page

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.login(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Log in and get the authentication tokens. In the event of a successful log-in, a cookie will be attached to your session. In the event of a failed log-in, you will not be able to attempt another log-in through this method for 5 seconds. This is to prevent password guessing by automated password crackers
member.param: User Name
Password
Domain (optional)
Login token obtained in first request

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.logout
member.summary: Log out and clear session data

member.summary: Move a page

A move token previously retrieved through prop=info
Title of the page you want to move. Cannot be used together with fromid
Page ID of the page you want to move. Cannot be used together with from
Reason for the move
Move the talk page, if it exists
Move subpages, if applicable
Don't create a redirect
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch
Ignore any warnings

Resets all preferences to the site defaults
List of changes, formatted name=value (e.g. skin=vector), value cannot contain pipe characters
A name of a option which should have an optionvalue set
A value of the option specified by the optionname, can contain pipe characters

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.Wiki.protect(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},LinqToWiki.Generated.protectwatchlist)
member.summary: Change the protection level of a page
member.param: A protect token previously retrieved through prop=info
List of protection levels, formatted action=group (e.g. edit=sysop)
Title of the page you want to (un)protect. Cannot be used together with pageid
ID of the page you want to (un)protect. Cannot be used together with title
Expiry timestamps. If only one timestamp is set, it'll be used for all protections. Use 'infinite', 'indefinite' or 'never', for a neverexpiring protection.
Reason for (un)protecting
Enable cascading protection (i.e. protect pages included in this page) Ignored if not all protection levels are 'sysop' or 'protect'
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch

member.summary: Undo the last edit to the page. If the last user who edited the page made multiple edits in a row, they will all be rolled back

Name of the user whose edits are to be rolled back. If set incorrectly, you'll get a badtoken error.
A rollback token previously retrieved through prop=revisions
Custom edit summary. If empty, default summary will be used
Mark the reverted edits and the revert as bot edits
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch

member.summary: Update the notification timestamp for watched pages. This affects the highlighting of changed pages in the watchlist and history, and the sending of email when the "E-mail me when a page on my watchlist is changed" preference is enabled.
member.param: A list of titles to work on
A list of page IDs to work on
A list of revision IDs to work on
Work on all watched pages
A token previously acquired via prop=info
Timestamp to which to set the notification timestamp
Revision to set the notification timestamp to (one page only)
Revision to set the notification timestamp newer than (one page only)

Timestamps of the revisions to restore. If not set, all revisions will be restored.
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch

member.summary: Upload a file, or get the status of pending uploads. Several methods are available: * Upload file contents directly, using the "file" parameter * Have the MediaWiki server fetch a file from a URL, using the "url" parameter * Complete an earlier upload that failed due to warnings, using the "filekey" parameter Note that the HTTP POST must be done as a file upload (i.e. using multipart/form-data) when sending the "file". Also you must get and send an edit token before doing any upload stuff
member.param: Edit token. You can get one of these through prop=info
Target filename
Upload comment. Also used as the initial page text for new files if "text" is not specified
Initial page text for new files
Unconditionally add or remove the page from your watchlist, use preferences or do not change watch
Ignore any warnings
File contents
URL to fetch the file from
Key that identifies a previous upload that was stashed temporarily.
If set, the server will not add the file to the repository and stash it temporarily.
Filesize of entire upload
Offset of chunk in bytes
Chunk contents
Make potentially large file operations asynchronous when possible
Make fetching a URL asynchronous
If asyncdownload is used, leave a message on the user talk page if finished
Fetch the upload status for this file key (upload by URL)
Only fetch the upload status for the given file key

If set the page will be unwatched rather than watched

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.deletedrevs
member.summary: List deleted revisions. Operates in three modes: 1) List deleted revisions for the given title(s), sorted by timestamp 2) List deleted contributions for the given user, sorted by timestamp (no titles specified) 3) List all deleted revisions in the given namespace, sorted by title and timestamp (no titles specified, druser not set) Certain parameters only apply to some modes and are ignored in others. For instance, a parameter marked (1) only applies to mode 1 and is ignored in modes 2 and 3

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.embeddedin
member.summary: Find all pages that embed (transclude) the given title

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.exturlusage
member.summary: Enumerate pages that contain a given URL

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.filearchive
member.summary: Enumerate all deleted files sequentially

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.imageusage
member.summary: Find all pages that use the given image title.

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.iwbacklinks
member.summary: Find all pages that link to the given interwiki link. Can be used to find all links with a prefix, or all links to a title (with a given prefix). Using neither parameter is effectively "All IW Links"

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.langbacklinks
member.summary: Find all pages that link to the given language link. Can be used to find all links with a language code, or all links to a title (with a given language). Using neither parameter is effectively "All Language Links"

member.summary: Get a list provided by a QueryPage-based special page
member.param: The name of the special page. Note, this is case sensitive

member.name: M:LinqToWiki.Generated.QueryAction.random
member.summary: Get a set of random pages NOTE: Pages are listed in a fixed sequence, only the starting point is random. This means that if, for example, "Main Page" is the first random page on your list, "List of fictional monkeys" will *always* be second, "List of people on stamps of Vanuatu" third, etc NOTE: If the number of pages in the namespace is lower than rnlimit, you will get fewer pages. You will not get the same page twice

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.to
member.summary: The user name to stop enumerating at

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.prefix
member.summary: Search for all users that begin with this value

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.group
member.summary: Limit users to given group name(s)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.excludegroup
member.summary: Exclude users in given group name(s)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.rights
member.summary: Limit users to given right(s) (does not include rights granted by implicit or auto-promoted groups like *, user, or autoconfirmed)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.witheditsonly
member.summary: Only list users who have made edits

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.allusersWhere.activeusers
member.summary: Only list users active in the last 30 days(s)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.backlinksWhere.title
member.summary: Title to search. Cannot be used together with blpageid

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.backlinksWhere.pageid
member.summary: Pageid to search. Cannot be used together with bltitle

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.backlinksWhere.ns
member.summary: The namespace to enumerate

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.backlinksWhere.filterredir
member.summary: How to filter for redirects. If set to nonredirects when blredirect is enabled, this is only applied to the second level

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.backlinksWhere.redirect
member.summary: If linking page is a redirect, find all pages that link to that redirect as well. Maximum limit is halved.

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.start
member.summary: The timestamp to start enumerating from

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.end
member.summary: The timestamp to stop enumerating at

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.ids
member.summary: List of block IDs to list (optional)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.users
member.summary: List of users to search for (optional)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.ip
member.summary: Get all blocks applying to this IP or CIDR range, including range blocks. Cannot be used together with bkusers. CIDR ranges broader than /16 are not accepted

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.blocksWhere.show
member.summary: Show only items that meet this criteria. For example, to see only indefinite blocks on IPs, set bkshow=ip|!temp

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categoriesWhere.show
member.summary: Which kind of categories to show

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categoriesWhere.categories
member.summary: Only list these categories. Useful for checking whether a certain page is in a certain category

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.title
member.summary: Which category to enumerate (required). Must include Category: prefix. Cannot be used together with cmpageid

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.pageid
member.summary: Page ID of the category to enumerate. Cannot be used together with cmtitle

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.ns
member.summary: Only include pages in these namespaces NOTE: Due to $wgMiserMode, using this may result in fewer than "cmlimit" results returned before continuing; in extreme cases, zero results may be returned. Note that you can use cmtype=subcat or cmtype=file instead of cmnamespace=14 or 6.

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.type
member.summary: What type of category members to include. Ignored when cmsort=timestamp is set

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.start
member.summary: Timestamp to start listing from. Can only be used with cmsort=timestamp

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.end
member.summary: Timestamp to end listing at. Can only be used with cmsort=timestamp

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.startsortkey
member.summary: Sortkey to start listing from. Must be given in binary format. Can only be used with cmsort=sortkey

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.endsortkey
member.summary: Sortkey to end listing at. Must be given in binary format. Can only be used with cmsort=sortkey

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.startsortkeyprefix
member.summary: Sortkey prefix to start listing from. Can only be used with cmsort=sortkey. Overrides cmstartsortkey

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.categorymembersWhere.endsortkeyprefix
member.summary: Sortkey prefix to end listing BEFORE (not at, if this value occurs it will not be included!). Can only be used with cmsort=sortkey. Overrides cmendsortkey

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.start
member.summary: The timestamp to start enumerating from (1, 2)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.end
member.summary: The timestamp to stop enumerating at (1, 2)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.from
member.summary: Start listing at this title (3)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.to
member.summary: Stop listing at this title (3)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.prefix
member.summary: Search for all page titles that begin with this value (3)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.unique
member.summary: List only one revision for each page (3)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.user
member.summary: Only list revisions by this user

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.excludeuser
member.summary: Don't list revisions by this user

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.deletedrevsWhere.ns
member.summary: Only list pages in this namespace (3)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.duplicatefilesWhere.localonly
member.summary: Look only for files in the local repository

member.summary: Title to search. Cannot be used together with eipageid

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.embeddedinWhere.pageid
member.summary: Pageid to search. Cannot be used together with eititle

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.embeddedinWhere.ns
member.summary: The namespace to enumerate

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.embeddedinWhere.filterredir
member.summary: How to filter for redirects

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.extlinksWhere.protocol
member.summary: Protocol of the url. If empty and elquery set, the protocol is http. Leave both this and elquery empty to list all external links

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.extlinksWhere.query
member.summary: Search string without protocol. Useful for checking whether a certain page contains a certain external url

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.extlinksWhere.expandurl
member.summary: Expand protocol-relative urls with the canonical protocol

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.exturlusageWhere.protocol
member.summary: Protocol of the url. If empty and euquery set, the protocol is http. Leave both this and euquery empty to list all external links

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.exturlusageWhere.query
member.summary: Search string without protocol. See [[Special:LinkSearch]]. Leave empty to list all external links

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.exturlusageWhere.ns
member.summary: The page namespace(s) to enumerate. NOTE: Due to $wgMiserMode, using this may result in fewer than "eulimit" results returned before continuing; in extreme cases, zero results may be returned

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.exturlusageWhere.expandurl
member.summary: Expand protocol-relative urls with the canonical protocol

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.filearchiveWhere.from
member.summary: The image title to start enumerating from

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.filearchiveWhere.to
member.summary: The image title to stop enumerating at

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.filearchiveWhere.prefix
member.summary: Search for all image titles that begin with this value

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.filearchiveWhere.sha1
member.summary: SHA1 hash of image. Overrides fasha1base36

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.filearchiveWhere.sha1base36
member.summary: SHA1 hash of image in base 36 (used in MediaWiki)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.start
member.summary: Timestamp to start listing from

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.end
member.summary: Timestamp to stop listing at

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.urlwidth
member.summary: If iiprop=url is set, a URL to an image scaled to this width will be returned. Only the current version of the image can be scaled

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.urlheight
member.summary: Similar to iiurlwidth. Cannot be used without iiurlwidth

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.metadataversion
member.summary: Version of metadata to use. if 'latest' is specified, use latest version. Defaults to '1' for backwards compatibility

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.urlparam
member.summary: A handler specific parameter string. For example, pdf's might use 'page15-100px'. iiurlwidth must be used and be consistent with iiurlparam

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageinfoWhere.localonly
member.summary: Look only for files in the local repository

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imagesWhere.images
member.summary: Only list these images. Useful for checking whether a certain page has a certain Image.

member.summary: Title to search. Cannot be used together with iupageid

member.summary: Pageid to search. Cannot be used together with iutitle

member.summary: The namespace to enumerate

member.summary: How to filter for redirects. If set to nonredirects when iuredirect is enabled, this is only applied to the second level

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.imageusageWhere.redirect
member.summary: If linking page is a redirect, find all pages that link to that redirect as well. Maximum limit is halved.

member.summary: Expand templates in revision content (requires rvprop=content)

member.summary: Generate XML parse tree for revision content (requires rvprop=content)

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.parse
member.summary: Parse revision content (requires rvprop=content). For performance reasons if this option is used, rvlimit is enforced to 1.

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.section
member.summary: Only retrieve the content of this section number

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.token
member.summary: Which tokens to obtain for each revision

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.diffto
member.summary: Revision ID to diff each revision to. Use "prev", "next" and "cur" for the previous, next and current revision respectively

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.difftotext
member.summary: Text to diff each revision to. Only diffs a limited number of revisions. Overrides rvdiffto. If rvsection is set, only that section will be diffed against this text

member.name: P:LinqToWiki.Generated.Entities.revisionsWhere.contentformat
member.summary: Serialization format used for difftotext and expected for output of content
